ygData.subject: RE: Nagafen Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: I have had in elsewhere, in befallen in fact. I thought I was feared, and checked, but there was no message in my buffer. I then thought it would run out, and
ygData.messageBody:
I have had in elsewhere, in befallen in fact.

I thought I was feared, and checked, but there was no message in my
buffer. I then thought it would run out, and it didn't. I then camped
and when I logged back on, it was fine. Didn't /bug it though :(

Utelr Souldrinker
Errolisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Douglas Babcock [mailto:dbabcock@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 09, 1999 9:50 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Nagafen Problems


From: "Douglas Babcock" <dbabcock@...>

Ok all you Nag killers

We attempted Nagafen last night.
Giants were all a piece of cake, no deaths and no real problems.

Heres the problem we encountered and I need to know If anyone else has
seen
this.

3 of our casters, 2 clerics and 1 enchanter lost the ability to cast
spells
during the melee.
I don't mean we were charmed or feared or roared. I mean, all spell and
hotkey functions were gone, as if fear effect continued forever.
We were forced to camp to clear effect.

We could have taken Nag easily if not for this. Losing 2 out of 3
clerics
does sort of affect the outcome of battle.

This is not a bitch nor am I inviting complaints

I need to know if anyone else has encountered this. We had a nice long
talk
with our Servers head GM and she wants to know as well so they can fix
this.

Thanks in advance

Joatmos
Xegony.
